Package ViewsAndControllers

Class AppointmentsByCustomerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViewsAndControllers.AppointmentsByCustomerController
  • public class AppointmentsByCustomerController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class makes a report of number the appointments by Customer by Type and by Month Use the radio buttons to select Type or Month. Use comboBoxes to choose a Customer, and a Month or Type, as appropriate. Press OK.
    Author:
    adamb

      • countApptsByMonth

        public int countApptsByMonth​(Customer customer,
                             java.time.Month month)
        gets the count of appointments for a selected month for a selected customer uses lambda to filter appointments to match those with parameter customerID uses lambda to filter the customer filtered appointments by the month parameter
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer selected by user
        month - the month selected by user
        Returns:
        int the count of filtered appointments by month

      • countApptsByType

                            java.lang.String type)
        gets the count of appointments for a selected type for a selected customer uses lambda to filter appointments to match those with parameter customerID uses lambda to filter the customer filtered appointments by the type parameter
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer selected by user
        type - the type selected by user
        Returns:
        int the count of filtered appointments by type
